login_screen.welcome_message: Hello, It's nice to have you here.
login_screen.remember_me: Save login details on this device
login_screen.footer_title: BryteVerse© by Publify is the future in Publishing.
login_screen.footer_feature_4: We centralize your content in one place

reset_password.title: Set Your Password
reset_password.subtitle: Choose a secure password to protect your account

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password?
forgot_password.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
forgot_password.success_message: Password reset link has been sent to your email

activate_switchboard.title: You're in!
activate_switchboard.description: Great, your company has been activated for Switchboard. Before you can start managing resources, let's quickly set up the board. But don't worry, it's very quick.

view_report.disclaimer_body:
for {fullName},
CEO of {companyName}, intended. Access is personalised and can only be activated from their inbox. Please close this window immediately if you are not {fullName}.
view_report.checkbox_hint: Dear {name}, click the box to legally confirm your identity pursuant to § 126 BGB (electronic declaration) and to open the reporting.
view_report.footer_legal: By opening this document you confirm pursuant to § 126 BGB that you are the authorised recipient and accept this electronic transmission as legally binding. Sharing or copying the content without express consent of BrightNetWorks GmbH is prohibited.
view_report.snackbar_processing: Token is being processed (integration to follow). Token length: {length}

set_organization_name.title_with_name: {name}, for which organization are you setting up Bryteswitch?
set_organization_name.title: For which organization are you setting up Bryteswitch?
set_organization_name.tip: Tip: Enter the company name as precisely as possible so that it can be recognized.

set_subdomain.title: Great, this is the subdomain for your Bryteswitch:
set_subdomain.tip: Tip: You and your colleagues will remember the subdomain more easily if it is identical to the name of the organization.

set_switch_image.title: Would you like to add a logo to your Bryteswitch?
set_switch_image.tip: Tip: Your organization's logo creates recognition and immediately clarifies who it's about.

set_switch_color.title: Would you like to personalise the look of your Bryteswitch?
set_switch_color.tip: Tip: You can choose an accent colour to match your switchboard to your organisation or company's look.

set_personalized_look.title: Would you like to personalise the look of your Bryteswitch?
set_personalized_look.option_3: Choose and override an accessible colour set
set_personalized_look.tip: Tip: Colours are powerful. It costs more energy to light a display with a light background and dark text than a display with a dark background and light text. We also offer an accessible colour mode to take the greatest possible account of people with special requirements (e.g. red-green weakness) or neurodivergence.

structure_switch.title: Would you like to structure your Bryteswitch already?
structure_switch.tip: Tip: We can already structure your Bryteswitch fundamentally now and save you a lot of work later. However, you can also start directly in your BryteSight-Verse and build the structure yourself.

confirm_structure.heading: Good decision, {name}. Let's start structured!
confirm_structure.description: Invest 3-5 minutes of your time now to start faster and more structured later. Together we will create your properties, record initial information, and make your Bryteswitch ready for use in simple steps. Together.

select_property_type.title: Where do you want to manage resources?
select_property_type.tip: Tip: You can create multiple sub-units like buildings or building parts within the locations. You can add locations at any time later.

add_property_name.title: What is the name of the property?

add_floor_name.title: What is the name of the floor?

add_additional_buildings.title: Does the property have additional buildings?

set_building_details.title: Great, what does the building look like?
set_building_details.rooms_hint: How many floors does the building have?
set_building_details.year_hint: What is the year of construction of the building?

building_contact_person.choose_one_contact: You can choose one contact from domain server
building_contact_person.title: Who is the contact person for the building?

building_recipient.title: Who should receive automatic reports?
building_recipient.validation_no_recipients: Please add at least one recipient
building_recipient.validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
building_recipient.reporting_dialog_title: How should the reporting for {name} look?
building_recipient.reporting_dialog_subtitle: You can customize reporting just for {name}.
building_recipient.create_contact_subtitle: Enter the report recipient details below.

building_responsible_persons.title: How should the reporting for {name} look?
building_responsible_persons.title_fallback: How should the reporting for Dirk look?
building_responsible_persons.title_for_all: How should the reporting for all users look?
building_responsible_persons.title_recipient: How should the reporting for {name} look?
building_responsible_persons.validation_name_required: Please enter a name for the reporting
building_responsible_persons.validation_option_required: Please select at least one report option
building_responsible_persons.validation_at_least_one_option: Please select at least one checkbox option

switch_switcher.title: Switch organization
switch_switcher.subtitle: Choose which organization to work in

main_content.welcome_back: Nice to have you back. Let's make your company a bit greener and more resilient together.
main_content.trigger_report_success: Report generation started. Check email for results.
main_content.what_do_you_need: What do you need right now?

statistics_dashboard.summary_resource_status: Resource status: stable, below previous year's consumption
statistics_dashboard.summary_cost_targets: All current cost targets met or exceeded
statistics_dashboard.summary_forecast_targets: Forecasted cost targets (fiscal year) currently met
statistics_dashboard.months_jan_jun: JAN  FEB  MAR  APR  MAY  JUN
statistics_dashboard.peak_load_analysis_subtitle: Peak load analysis only for anomalies
statistics_dashboard.last_peak_detail: Last peak: 14 May, 3:00 PM – 47% above average.
statistics_dashboard.warehouse_water_increase: The warehouse building shows 14% more water consumption since 15 May.
statistics_dashboard.targets_covered: Concrete and forecasted targets continue to be met
statistics_dashboard.thanks_goodbye: Thank you for your time, {name}, and see you tomorrow!
statistics_dashboard.report_created: Reporting created on 07.11 at 10:38 based on 31 days of measurement data.
statistics_dashboard.report_disclaimer: This reporting is part of the ESG data room of BrightNetWorks GmbH.
statistics_dashboard.no_report_token: No report token available. Please open the report via the link in your email.

complete.notification_hint: You will be notified once they have accepted it.

invite_user.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
invite_user.select_company_first_snackbar: Please select a company from the dashboard first.
invite_user.select_company_first_warning: Please select a company from the dashboard first.
invite_user.employee_profile_info:
What does your organization need to know?
If {name} is an employee of your organization, you can link their employee profile.

almost.headline: Almost there!
almost.invited_to_switch: You have been invited to join the switch "{organization}".
almost.permissions_hint: By joining this switch, you will get access to the data and features that the administration has granted to you.

superadmin.description: Manage and configure all Bryteswitch instances

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.message: The page you are looking for could not be found. It may have been moved or deleted.
